TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProviderMetadata extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Contains static information about an event provider, such as the name and id of the provider, and the collection of events defined in the provider.

remarks.format: ## Examples For example code using this class, see [How to: Retrieve Information About an Event Publisher](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2a3e897f-25a9-4dad-8541-171ac49970a3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string providerName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the event provider that you want to retrieve information about.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.ProviderMetadata"> class by specifying the name of the provider that you want to retrieve information about.

MemberSignature.Value: public ProviderMetadata (string providerName, System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogSession session, System.Globalization.CultureInfo targetCultureInfo);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string providerName, class System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogSession session, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo targetCultureInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the event provider that you want to retrieve information about.

The <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogSession"> object that specifies whether to get the provider information from a provider on the local computer or a provider on a remote computer.
The culture that specifies the language that the information should be returned in.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.ProviderMetadata"> class by specifying the name of the provider that you want to retrieve information about, the event log service that the provider is registered with, and the language that you want to return the information in.
Gets the localized name of the event provider.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the localized name of the event provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all the resources used by this object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: `true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.
Gets an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata"> objects, each of which represents an event that is defined in the provider.
Docs.value: Returns an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventMetadata"> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets the base of the URL used to form help requests for the events in this event provider.
Gets the globally unique identifier (GUID) for the event provider.
Docs.value: Returns the GUID value for the event provider.

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventKeyword"> objects, each of which represent an event keyword that is defined in the event provider.
Docs.value: Returns an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventKeyword"> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLevel"> objects, each of which represent a level that is defined in the event provider.
Docs.value: Returns an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLevel"> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogLink"> objects, each of which represent a link to an event log that is used by the event provider.
Docs.value: Returns an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogLink"> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets the path of the file that contains the message table resource that has the strings associated with the provider metadata.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the path of the provider message file.

Docs.summary: Gets the unique name of the event provider.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the unique name of the event provider.

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventOpcode"> objects, each of which represent an opcode that is defined in the event provider.
Docs.value: Returns an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventOpcode"> objects.

Docs.summary: Gets the path of the file that contains the message table resource that has the strings used for parameter substitutions in event descriptions.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the path of the file that contains the message table resource that has the strings used for parameter substitutions in event descriptions.

Docs.summary: Gets the path to the file that contains the metadata associated with the provider.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the path to the file that contains the metadata associated with the provider.

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventTask"> objects, each of which represent a task that is defined in the event provider.
Docs.value: Returns an enumerable collection of <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventTask"> objects.
